name: Pete Repeat
description:
DESCRIPTION

Awaken in an unknown laboratory, completely unaware of your whereabouts, figure out how to escape these mysterious halls woven through two time periods. The discovered time machine can assist you with this task. Thread carefully, as your only way out is to use time to your advantage. Things change with time, bear that in mind. Observe the environment in the present and the future to escape the facility in one piece. Succeed and you might uncover something unexpected at the very end.

CONTROLS

[WASD] - move

E - pick up cards / teleport / open doors

ATTENTION: THE GAME SOMETIMES RETURNS A 'FATAL ERROR' MESSAGE WHEN CLICKING PLAY. JUST RESTART THE GAME TO FIX THIS. WE WILL TRY TO RESOLVE THIS ISSUE AS SOON AS POSSIBLE!
